title: Imagination Was the First Thing They Took—Reclaiming it is How Resistance Begins
summary: Most people aren't resisting transformation—they're waiting for someone to show them what it looks like. Reclaiming imagination isn't optional, it's critical infrastructure for building the world we want to live in.

Narrative.summary: Reclaim your ability to imagine and story different futures into being.

level0: Describe a day in your ideal community
Ask family 'what would a perfect day look like?' instead of 'how was your day?'
level1: Co-create a story with a friend or journal
Sketch or describe your imagined life with someone else
level3: Build storytelling infrastructure in your community
Develop neighborhood vision and action plans

Community.summary: Use shared imagination to build real connections and systems.

level0: Find and follow a fringe thread - try something you'd normally dismiss
level1: Share a vision exercise with neighbors
Join or start a local imagination group
level3: Build systems that reflect shared imagination

Knowledge.summary: Learn to see systems differently and practice imagining without permission.

level0: Practice describing alternatives to current systems you use
level1: Study examples of successful alternative systems
level2: Develop skills in facilitation and community organizing
level3: Teach others to imagine and build alternative systems
